      • getInstance

        public static MyAlgorithmParameterSpec getInstance​(java.lang.String NParameterString)
                                            throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                   java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                   java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                   java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                   java.lang.SecurityException
        This is a class for generating a parameter specification for one algorithm.
        参数:
        NParameterString - The string indicates the algorithm and the parameter it uses. Values are separated by "/" and form a single String. i.e. "RSA/2048" indicates its a parameter for RSA with 2048 bit of modulus size. If the String is not fully configured, default values are added. i.e. For DES algorithm, 4 parameters are required, configured as "DES/$mode/$Padding/$initialVector". If "DES" is sent, originally it will fill up as "DES/ECB/NoPadding/a1b2c3d4" for the common usage. However, at least the name of the algorithm is required.
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.lang.SecurityException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
